feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for Tennessee Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 3:47PM CST until February 17 at 9:00PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi, West Tennessee, East Arkansas and the Missouri Bootheel. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Crockett; Dyer; Fayette; Gibson; Haywood; Lake; Lauderdale; Obion; Shelby; Tipton; Weakley

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 3:47PM CST until February 17 at 9:00PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi and West Tennessee. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 3:43PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Davidson, eastern Dickson, western Sumner, northern Williamson, northwestern Wilson, Cheatham, northeastern Hickman and Robertson Counties through 430 PM CST... At 342 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Coopertown to near Burns.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Cheatham; Davidson; Dickson; Hickman; Robertson; Sumner; Williamson; Wilson

cap:geocode.value: TNZ007 TNZ008 TNZ025 TNZ026 TNZ027 TNZ028 TNZ057 TNZ059

entry.title: High Wind Warning issued February 17 at 2:40PM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. * WHERE...Southeast Greene, Sevier Smoky Mountains, Cocke Smoky Mountains, Blount Smoky Mountains and Southeast Monroe Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Johnson; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi

entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee, southwest Virginia and southwest North Carolina.

entry.title: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 1:53PM CST until February 17 at 8:00PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi and West Tennessee, including the following counties, in North Mississippi, DeSoto. In West Tennessee, Shelby.

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 1:11PM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40-50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northeast and northwest Alabama and southern middle Tennessee. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to midnight CST Thursday night.

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 2:16AM CST until February 17 at 9:00PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...All of Middle Tennessee. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
